org.jsimpledb.core

Class ReferenceField

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jsimpledb.core.SchemaItem
      • org.jsimpledb.core.Field<T>
        • org.jsimpledb.core.SimpleField<ObjId>
          • org.jsimpledb.core.ReferenceField

  • public class ReferenceField
extends SimpleField<ObjId>
    A field that references another Database object.

    Null values sort last.

    Reference fields are always indexed.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.jsimpledb.core.SchemaItem

        NAME_PATTERN

        public DeleteAction getOnDelete()

      • isCascadeDelete

        public boolean isCascadeDelete()
        Determine whether the referred-to object should be deleted when an object containing this field is deleted.
        Returns:
        whether deletion should cascade to the referred-to object

      • getObjectTypes

        public SortedSet<Integer> getObjectTypes()
        Get the object types this field is allowed to reference, if so restricted.
        Returns:
        storage IDs of allowed object types, or null if there is no restriction
